entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
